n = int(input())
r = 0
l = [1,5,10,20,100]
while n > 0:
    i = len(l)-1
    while l[i] > n:
        i -= 1
    n -= l[i]
    r += 1
print(r)

n = int(input())
d = [100, 20, 10, 5, 1]
ans = 0
i = 0
while n > 0:
	while n < d[i]:
		i += 1
	s = n // d[i]
	ans += s
	n -= s * d[i]

print(ans)

#!/usr/bin/env python3
from sys import stdin


def solve(tc):
    n = int(stdin.readline().strip())
    ans = n // 100
    n %= 100
    ans += n // 20
    n %= 20
    ans += n // 10
    n %= 10
    ans += n // 5
    n %= 5
    ans += n
    print(ans)
    pass


LOCAL_TEST = not __debug__
if LOCAL_TEST:
    infile = __file__.split('.')[0] + "-test.in"
    stdin = open(infile, 'r')

tcs = (int(stdin.readline().strip()) if LOCAL_TEST else 1)
tc = 1
while tc <= tcs:
    solve(tc)
    tc += 1
